title: FS: T215 Mcgraw, T213-1 Hoffman - poor
author: SMPEP

posts.post_title: FS: T215 Mcgraw, T213-1 Hoffman - poor
posts.post_content:
Still have a T213-1 Hoffman for sale.

$200 or best offer.  (There has to be a better home for this "beauty" than my measley collection!)

Cheers,
Patrick

Hi Patrick,
Cool cards.  I don't want to misdirect your selling thread, but I have a T215 that also shows back damage, a hole punch, black lettering crossed out and replaced with blue lettering.  Might have originated from the same collection.

Good luck with your sale.  If I wasn't involved in a house remodeling project at the moment I would pull the trigger on these scarce cards.

Rick

posts.post_title: Re: FS: T215 Mcgraw, T213-1 Hoffman - poor
posts.post_content: I wondered who else spotted that hidden lot. Good luck with the sale.

That's interesting Rick.  The seller used the old ... cleaning out grandpa's attic and found these line ... and for once that appears to be the real deal.

Maybe grandpa got rid of yours before this one?

Who is yours?

And more interestingly ... if we have 27 and 42 ... I wonder if there are 40 others out there?

Cheers,
Patrick
